turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS, Badge #IRS-7734. I'm here about an important matter regarding Walter Thompson's tax compliance issues for last year. We've been trying to reach you several times. Is this a good time to discuss this further?
Oh my goodness, Mr. Mitchell. This is quite unexpected. Yes, of course, it's a good time. My wife and I were just finishing up some chores. What seems to be the issue exactly?

Walter, we've identified several discrepancies in your tax filings from last year which amount to unpaid taxes totaling $4850. This is considered a serious violation of federal law, and if it's not resolved immediately, there could be severe consequences, including immediate arrest or other legal actions against you.
Now, I understand this can be stressful, but we want to help you resolve this issue swiftly. The quickest way to do that would be to purchase gift cards in the amount of $4850 and provide me with the card numbers now so we can process it right away and clear your name.
Is there anyone here who might assist in resolving this matter?

Oh dear, I hadn't expected something like this. My wife is just behind me. Can she come over here to help?
She's on her way, but Mr. Mitchell, do you think it would be alright if we go through the numbers one more time? Maybe there was a mistake or something? We live on a fixed income and $4850 seems like quite a lot.
But please, let me know what to do next. How many gift cards are we talking about here exactly? Should they all be the same type?
My wife is here now, Mrs. Thompson. Would it help if she were also on this call?

I understand your concern Walter and I appreciate you bringing your wife into this. However, we don't have much time left to address this issue before our enforcement officers are dispatched to handle the situation personally.
To resolve this quickly, you need to buy 485 dollar Best Buy or Walmart gift cards, a total of ten cards. Once you have them ready, I'll walk you through entering the card numbers and codes for us to process your payment immediately. This will prevent any legal actions from being taken against either one of you.
Please do this as soon as possible and call back into my line with the card details when you're ready. The faster we resolve this the better it is for both of you.
Are there any questions before I hang up? Remember, time is of the essence here.
